entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
